item.title: Version 2.3.12
item.description:
[2.3.12] - 2026-02-18

Added

  • Preferences Dialog: View → Settings → Preferences (Ctrl+,) opens a settings dialog
  • Configure wire connection visibility and radius, gridline display, and refresh rate
  • Refresh rate shown as FPS for clarity, stored as milliseconds internally
  • Settings apply immediately and persist across sessions
  • Save As Shortcut: Cmd+Shift+S (macOS) / Ctrl+Shift+S for quick Save As access

Fixed

  • Critical: Simulation freeze on conflicting inputs
  • Added max events cap to prevent infinite event loops when gates receive conflicting signals
  • Simulator no longer locks up requiring force quit
  • Critical: Simulation/rendering decoupling
  • Decoupled simulation thread from rendering via shared state buffer
  • Eliminates rendering stalls caused by simulation load and vice versa
  • Pause icon not updating on simulator panic (macOS)
  • Toolbar now correctly swaps to the play icon when the simulator enters panic/pause state
  • Previously only toggled the button state without updating the SF Symbol
  • Clipboard copy on macOS
  • Fixed clipboard export failing silently on macOS

Full Changelog: https://github.com/taciturnaxolotl/CedarLogic/compare/v2.3.11...v2.3.12
